get_fdr

Source: R/other_functions.R
get_fdr.Rd

This function fetches FPL's 'team strength' measures, which form the basis of the 'FDR' (Fixture Difficulty Rating)

get_fdr()

Examples

get_fdr()
#>    id current_event_fixture                        next_event_fixture
#> 1   1                  NULL                       1, 4, 3, 311, 1, 15
#> 2   2  1, 3, 1, 301, 16, 15                      0, 3, 1, 317, 30, 11
#> 3   3                  NULL  1, 0, 3, 4, 1, 5, 312, 265, 30, 3, 16, 6
#> 4   4  1, 3, 1, 303, 16, 11                      1, 3, 1, 313, 30, 20
#> 5   5                  NULL  1, 0, 3, 4, 2, 5, 314, 325, 31, 3, 6, 13
#> 6   6   0, 3, 2, 304, 17, 8   0, 1, 3, 4, 2, 5, 314, 265, 31, 3, 5, 3
